Class SongCellController

java.lang.Object
musicApp.controllers.ViewController<SongCellView>
musicApp.controllers.songs.SongCellController
All Implemented Interfaces:
SongCell.SongCellListener, SongCellView.SongCellViewListener
public class SongCellController extends ViewController<SongCellView> implements SongCellView.SongCellViewListener, SongCell.SongCellListener
